ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampirella is tracking a vampire couple, but finds that someone has beaten her to the kill and the female is decapitated. Tracking the male to his house, Vampirella is confronted by Shi (who killed the female vampire). The male vampire returns home and attacks Vampirella, as a group of Yakuza attack Shi.
The Yakuza are easily defeated, but Shi and Vampirella argue over the male vampire whom Shi does not want to kill as she has no argument with him. After a cat fight with Shi, Vampirella manages to kill the vampire and leaves.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/vampirellashi-1-nine-kinds-of-dirt/4000-118817/
ComicInfo.Title: Nine Kinds of Dirt
